title: https://stocktwits.com/. Not Loading (it does on chrome)
content:
Hello, 

 Please update firefox to allow https://stocktwits.com/ to load properly, sometimes it does, but most of the time it does not, not sure what changed.   I tested in on chrome and it's working no problem at all.    Also, clicking into the different stock symbols is not working either.

title: Is Firefox's native screenshot not at the adress bar anymore?
content:
Hi there!

I'm using Firefox Nightly version 88.0a1 (2021-03-19) (64-bit) at the moment. And I couldn't help but notice that the native screenshot option is absent from my adress bar menu.

It is avaiable at the customization options, but I don't know if it's possible to get it back "inside" the address bar.

Can someone help me out?
creator: igorcmendonca
